EntryName	TMM79_HUMAN
ProteinName	Transmembrane protein 79 (Mattrin)
GeneName	TMEM79 MATT
Length	394
Function	Contributes to the epidermal integrity and skin barrier function. Plays a role in the lamellar granule (LG) secretory system and in the stratum corneum (SC) epithelial cell formation (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Lysosome; Golgi apparatus; trans-Golgi network; Membrane
